title: Iran Policy, Impeachment, Ghosn Escape
itunes:title: Iran Policy, Impeachment, Ghosn Escape
description:
Panel guests: Louise Schiavone, Journalist and Senior Lecturer at Johns Hopkins University Carey Business School and Erik Wasson, Bloomberg Congressional reporter.


Brian Hook, U.S. Special Representative for Iran, and Senior Policy Advisor to Secretary of State Mike Pompeo discussed Iran policy and the U.S. missile strikes in Iraq over the weekend.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
